amendment.description: To prohibit increasing the public debt limit under reconciliation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 855 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 44. Record Vote Number: 132.

action.text: Amendment SA 855 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S1979-1980, S2012-2013; text: CR S1979) To prohibit increasing the public debt limit under reconciliation.
